modules.searchString: This module provides the API for Java interoperability in Ballerina.

objects.searchString: The Ballerina abstract object which is to be extended by Ballerina objects representing Ballerina bindings for Java classes.

functions.searchString: Returns an JObject|error, which is obtained after casting the provided JObject instance to the given JObject type depending on assignability.
Returns a handle, which refers to Java null.
Returns a handle, which refers to the Java string representation of the Ballerina string.
Returns a handle, which refers to the Java Class object associated with the class or interface with the given string name.
Returns true if this handle refers to Java null.
Returns the string representation of a Java object stored in a handle reference.
Returns a Ballerina string representation of the Java object referred by the handle.

records.searchString: Describes a Java class that corresponds to a Ballerina object.

errors.searchString: Represents a JavaError with the message and the cause.
